name: Christy Culotta
text: Best cake I have ever eaten! My guests went back for seconds! Cake was moist icing was light fluffy not greasy! Laura met the design I requested perfectly! Will continue to buy our cakes here! My guests will also buy from here!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your preference and this is my pleasure 😊!

name: Ramya V
text: They made my baby first birthday cake 🎂 It was so delicious 😋 & mouth watering 🤤 The medium moist cake tastes like a pastry, you can eat more & more cake as the icing is so tasty.

resp.text: Thank you 😊!

name: christi callahan
text:
I have gotten several cakes from here and they do a wonderful job on what you are asking.
Due to covid this past year, I was unable to get our kids birthday cakes from here

But definitely looking forward in coming back here this year.
The filling and moistness of the cakes are delish!!! 😋😋

I worked in a bakery for years and years and I recommend this place over most bakeries in the area.
Keep up the good work you guys!! ❤️

name: Karen Mendes
text: They really do make some rich cakes and decorate them very beautiful, but I didn't like that they still use the sticks for the cakes and they didn't tell me for my 3 year old son's cake that they had put chopsticks on it.

name: Kelsey Manley
text: Cakes Las Comadres made a beautiful and delicious tres Leches cake for my daughter’s birthday! I shared the design I wanted, and it came to life beautifully. I also ordered cake pops with a cactus design, and they were just as beautiful and delicious. We will return for future cake needs!

resp.text: Thank you so much it is our pleasure!

name: James Floyd
text: This was more than just a birthday cake it was a piece of art, my first time using this Bakery  for my daughterthat was turning 5. The owner really took the time to discover my needs and wants, the finished product was not only a masterpiece but it tastes as good as it looked. Please take the time to visit this place they also have samples that you can taste, I shopped around for cakes and everyone seems to run to grocery stores to get a cakes made which cost more than does cake I could not believe the price for what I got was less than grocery stores.

resp.text: Thank you so much it's my pleasure

name: Aaron Streufert
text: I picked up a slice of tres leches cake for my fiancé yesterday. We had heard it was unbelievable and it absolutely was! The cake was probably among the best things I’ve ever eaten! I highly recommend cakes los comadres! As a matter of fact I already have twice today!

name: Kertina Moore
text: They made my wedding cake. It was delicious and sooo gorgeous.

name: Allison Cash
text: The best cakes in town ! Not overly sweet . The owner is amazing ! I will be getting every cake I need from there ! A must try ! U will not be disappointed!

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Miss Lauren
text: I’ve ordered two tres leche cakes and they were both yummy. Vanilla with strawberry filling was delicious. Beautifully done and reasonably priced. Super sweet folks and the store looks so clean and shiny lol.

resp.text: Thank you 😊!

name: Amanda Gramstad
text: The woman who runs this business knows how bake a great cake! Tres leches with fruit in the middle and creme for frosting, oh my! Light, creamy, refreshing. My only comment is if you do not speak Spanish, ask when someone will be at the shop who speaks English and call back at the appropriate time or for a visit to discuss details when ordering a cake. Our family has ordered a number of cakes from Cakes Las Comadres. They have all been wonderful!

resp.text: Thank you so much it's my pleasure

name: Marsy
text: When we have a special occasion, we love coming here. They have the best tasting cakes and beautifully decorated. It’s worth every penny! I’m not a fan of tres leches, so I usually get it less milky. I LOVE the frosting they put on the cakes though. Never had an issue with them. The only thing I suggest is having someone who is friendly at the counter.

resp.text: Thank you so much I is my pleasure!

name: Andy Spero
text: My daughter bought her wedding cake here. It was both beautiful and delicious (and inexpensive). Very strongly recommended.

name: Dean Ethridge
text: If there is a more talented cake decorator in Birmingham AL I'd have to see it.  These ladies are amazing at what they do.  The cakes taste fantastic in addition to being beautiful.  You'll love Cakes Las Comadres

name: April Edwards
text: Very talented cake decorators. My daughter's cake was beautiful. I'm getting ready to order my son's cake now. If you need a cake, give them a try. They will not disappoint!

name: Salimah Shamsuddin
text: Laura did an amazing job with my wedding cake! It was beautiful and delicious! This is by far one of the best bakeries Birmingham has to offer!

name: Chase J (TheChaseJohnston)
text: I love everything about Cakes Las Comadres! The empanadas are amazing! If you haven't tried a Tres Leches cake, I highly suggest you stop by here for any of your wedding, birthday, or sweet tooth fantasies!

resp.text: Thank you so much Chase!

name: Bertha Hidalgo
text: I have been buying from Las Comadres since before they had a store front.  Their cakes exceed excellence in both taste and decoration.  They are simply the best!!

name: Yesenia Benites
text: the best cakes in birmingham the best decoration and a super work I love they are always beautiful Gracias Laura siempre más que satisfecha

resp.text: Thanks to you for choosing us!

name: Randall Calhoun
text: Great people ! Wonderful cakes.

resp.text: Thanks to you for choosing us!

name: Revathi Narra
text: Tasty cake and lovely designs, made my daughter's birthday so special...

resp.text: Thanks for choosing us

name: Jhasmin Flores
text: Only reason I’m giving a two is because the taste was good but she did not make our wedding cake like we asked her to . Was really disappointed it looked nothing like the picture we showed her . Her excuse was she didn’t see the Cupid arrow we wanted on the cake but she took a picture and still failed to get the flower colors wrong so there is no excuse . This will be our last time getting a cake there . It was suppose to be a valentine theme cake but nope didn’t look nothing like a valentine cake .

name: Jaber Alnajar
text: The best in town

resp.text: Thank you so much

name: Jesie Lawrence
text: These ladies make some amazing cakes. They look beautiful, but they taste even better. So far I have had 2 chocolate Tres Leches cakes, one with peaches and nuts inside and one with strawberries (in between the layers). The icing is so light and fluffy, and the cake itself is so moist and delicious having been soaked in milk. The whole experience is delightful. They also have candles and cake accessories in the store, which is very helpful. I also had a few of the fruit-filled empanadas from the display on the counter, which were pretty tasty. If you're ever near Chandalar in Pelham, you've got to check them out!

name: Michael Kihiu
text: Mwaaaaa. Cakes  can't be  better than that at this place i just love their cakes.

name: Edwin Leal
text: Excellent flavor, very good looking cakes and made on the spot!!!

name: Drew Templeton
text: Super friendly people, amazing cakes.

name: Mariyam Tazhiba
text: Great service, great cakes and great people!

name: PATTY MOON
text:
(Translated by Google) 🦋Its taste is second to none and that I hardly went for the test that I will ask for for the next few months the very kind Susanna lady explained everything to me so I think I will order my cake here 🎂 (they should have more variety and more full counters) the designs that They showed us they are super cute

(Original)
🦋su sabor es inigualable y eso que apenas fui por la prueba del que pediré para los próximos meses la señora susana muy amable nos explico todo así que creo ordenaré aquí mi pastel 🎂 (deberían tener más variedad y más llenos los mostradores)los diseños que nos mostraron son súper lindos🦋

name: AlexZandra Sanchez
text:
(Translated by Google) We ordered a cake in his store and when we finished singing happy birthday to our daughter, as a tradition, we pushed our face in the cake, but our daughter said no, this hot is hot she was trying to tell us something, so I touch the sheet green. to show that it is not hot and it turned out that there was a toothpick covered in frosting, we were all in shock, we were about to turn its face into toothpicks next time you make a cake like this, you need to inform the customer that it is made with toothpicks before someone is sent to the hospital

(Original)
Pedimos un pastel en su tienda y cuando terminamos de cantarle el feliz cumpleaños a nuestra hija, como tradición, empujamos la cara en el pastel, pero nuestra hija decía que no, esta caliente está caliente estaba tratando de decirnos algo, así que toco la hoja verde. para mostrar que no está caliente y resultó que había un palillo cubierto de glaseado, estábamos todos en estado de shock, estábamos a punto de convertir su cara en palillos de dientes la próxima vez que hagas un pastel como este, debes informarle al cliente que está hecho con palillos de dientes antes de que alguien sea enviado al hospital

resp.text:
(Translated by Google) Better be more careful when pushing someone on a cake many of the times the decorations require us to put certain things, people find it easy to push people on the cakes without weighing the consequences and of course they blame whoever makes the cake, Be more careful and do not blame someone else for your mistakes, you have to remove all the accessories that it brings before anything else, imagine with the force that pushed her wow!

(Original)
Mejor ten mas cuidado cuando empujes a alguien en un pastel muchas de las veces los decorados requieren que pongamos ciertas cosas, las personas se les hace facil empujar a las personas en los pasteles sin medir las consecuencias y desde luego culpan a quien hace el pastel, ten mas cuidado y no culpes a alguien mas por tus errores,al pastel le tienes que quitar todos los accesorios que trae antes de cualquier cosa, imaginate con la fuerza que la empujaron wow!

name: Gardelia Romero
text:
(Translated by Google) The decoration they make is very good but with respect to the cake and its consistency it is slightly raw and caked which at the time of eating it is an unpleasant sensation.

(Original)
La decoración que hacen es muy buena pero con respecto al pastel y su consistencia está ligeramente crudo y apelmazado lo cual en el momento de comerlo es una sensación desagradable.

name: Irete Kutan Ifaokikio
text:
(Translated by Google) We were super satisfied with the order. A very good attention and a very good quality. Blessings .

(Original)
Quedamos super satisfechos con el pedido. Una muy Buena atencion y una muy Buena calidad.  Bendiciones .

resp.text:
(Translated by Google) Thanks for choosing us

(Original)
Gracias por preferirnos

name: Regina Prado
text:
(Translated by Google) Perfect .... delicious ..
And the store has a score of 10 for sanitary surveillance
You are to be congratulated..!

(Original)
Perfeito....delicioso..
E a loja tem nota 10 pela vigilancia sanitaria
Voces estão de Parabens..!

name: Conny Ballesteros
text:
(Translated by Google) Very delicious cakes especially the reindeer with flan ..

(Original)
Muy deliciosos pasteles en especial el reyeno con flan ..

resp.text: Thanks for your comment !

name: Susan Tolley
text: Almond croissant is to DIE for! Everything was beyond excellent.  We got a variety of treats and were not disappointed! The staff was exceptionally nice, coffee was fantastic! Highly suggest everyone visit!

name: Amy Dodson
text: This place is totally awesome! I would definitely recommend this basket to anyone. They made me a 50th wedding anniversary 3 tier cake for my parents and was absolutely beautiful as well as delicious!! Thank you so much for the cake!! It was a hit!

name: Chelle Ham
text: I'm so glad that I found out about this bakery. I have missed pastries and the grocery store alternatives just don't cut it around here. My husband loves chocolate croissants and I am a big almond croissant fan. We met in Germany and travelled all around Europe so we know our croissants!  I'm happy to give a 5 out of 5 rating because the almond croissant really is that good! It reminded me of home and I am so thankful for that moment of sweet breakfast bliss! The bakery itself is so adorable and smells like heaven. I will be back!

name: Michele Reed
text: I have been delighted with every treat I have tried here. Worth every calorie! The staff are always kind and helpful. I had an anniversary cake done for my parents 54th, little did I know that just a week after surprising my parents with it my father would pass. I’m thankful that we had this sweet treat to remember their last anniversary.

name: Dan Demars
text: Wow! Mmmmm.... If you got a sweet tooth don't pass by this place.

name: Hannah Martian
text: I’ve now found my favorite little place in Dothan! Great coffee and amazingly delicious desserts. Cute, trendy and very clean! The best part? The staff is so kind and welcoming! 10/10 recommended ♥️☕️ 🥮 🍪 🧁 🍰

name: Jordan King
text: got scones and macaroons and a cake bomb and they were all soo good!

name: Tanya Chandler
text: The aroma of the store is mouth watering and the appearance of the store is one of the best around.

name: Dale Holdsworth
text: The scones are fantastic!!!

name: Brittany Fossett
text: Our cake was everything we could have ever wanted! It was beautiful and tasted delicious! People have been raving about it. Not only was the cake perfect, Magnificent Cakes is one of the most competitively priced cake shops in Birmingham. I highly recommend them!

name: Keyanna Walker
text: She is awesome and very professional.

name: Lindsay Grissom
text: The cakes are amazing!!!! We tasted multiple cake vendors in our search and no one compares. The cake tastes amazing and all the guests at the wedding couldn't stop talking about it. Magnificent cakes is also super affordable for the Birmingham area, I HIGHLY recommend her cakes!

name: Shayna Epes
text: Had our wedding cake done here, it was perfect and tasted amazing. We froze the top layer and It still was moist, fluffy, and tasted amazing a year later!

name: Laquenta Erby
text: I just  love the red velvet cake that they make. And it is magnificent 👌

name: Shakecol81
text:
I hired Magnificent Cakes of Birmingham, AL to make my wedding cake. From start to finish, Hilde was great to work with. She was responsive and provided clear instruction about the cake design. The wedding cake was delivered on time and it was both beautiful and tasty. The price of the cake was affordable.

I would recommend purchasing your own cake stand from E-Bay for $30.00, however. If you rent the stand from this Hilde, you'll have send it back and pay a rental fee which is nearly the same cost as purchasing your own stand. That choice is yours to make. I ordered my own stand.

Overall, she delivered what I asked for. My guests enjoyed the cake and so did my groom and I. We will use Magnificent Cakes again.

name: Crissie Johnson
text: Hilde at Magnificent Cakes was wonderful to work with. From our initial consultation (where she sent me home with an extra plate of sample for my fiance who was out of town) to perfect on-time delivery, we couldn't have been happier. Not only was our cake beautiful, but it was delicious. We got tons of compliments on how delicious our wedding cake was. When we got back from our honeymoon, we enjoyed a slice out of the freezer, and it was still delicious. The almond cake is especially delicious!

name: Amanda Hendricks
text: Magnificent Cakes made my wedding cake and it was beyond beautiful! She did such a wonderful job. We did four layers - 2 layers of vanilla, 1 layer of strawberry, and 1 layer of red velvet. The strawberry and red velvet were a huge hit! Would 100% recommend Magnificant Cakes to anyone. The prices are really reasonable.

name: Felix Hines
text: Highly recommend you give them a try not only do they create beautiful 🎂 and pastries they are 😋

name: Aisha Johnson
text: Prices were great . The only thing with the cakes are they don't have enough sugar in the cake itself. Everything else was ok

name: Haymaker ubettalookout
text: 5 stars

name: Barbara Daniel
text: Wonderful!

name: Nicole Shultz
text: Absolutely amazing experience!  They were able to take a couple photos I found on Pinterest and create the most amazing creation for my daughter’s 6 year old birthday!  Highly recommend them!

name: Judy Johnston
text: Family owned and operated. All goodies are homemade fresh. I love everything! Birthday cakes are fresh, moist and flavorful as well as beautiful! I am really partial to the giant chocolate chip & peanut butter cookies and scones.

name: Amanda Bishop
text: I visited here today for the first time in a long time. I used to stop by here after high school for a Cranberry and White Chocolate scone, and wow are they just as delicious as I remember! This place is worth a stop. Very kind staff, I’ve never had a bad experience

name: Mallory Meriwether
text:
NEVER AGAIN! I just walked in there to get my 4 year old daughter one of their Signature Milkshakes that you see in the photo above. When we walked in they said that they were too busy make one of these milkshakes for my daughter. There were zero customers in the store.

My daughter left the store crying. They did not seem to care in the slightest. Don’t advertise something that you are too “busy” to make.

resp.text: Sorry we were not able to accommodate you.  We lost a day due to the storms and we were short staffed.  We were still preparing cupcakes and filling our cases as was stated.  I can't prepare a Milkshake without everything that is needed to go on it. Sorry for the inconvenience

name: Lauren Braxton
text: Everything tastes amazing, down to their homemade whipped cream! The milkshakes are out of this world, and you can’t beat their awesome customer service! Love Tee’s!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review of our business.  Your opinion means so much to us.  So glad you enjoyed your shake,  and our customer service.  We hope to see you again soon.

name: Steven Jemison
text: Just heard of this place a few weeks ago, this was the second trip here!!! They have so many choices I just want one of every thing , had the mini strawberry cake last time wow!!!!! Tried the mini key lime pie this time, and a peanut butter brownie,  chocolate chip cookie and a toffee crunch cookie. After reading the other reviews I have to say the staff here was very friendly the two times I went in.

name: Red Stepchild
text:
** HUBBY got out of Trouble w/ Tee's Cupcakes. **
My Hubby forgot what day it was. In a panic, he visited Tea's and they SAVE HIS HEINNEY with a fabulous Glamorous cupcake that was so AMAZING that I couldn't believe he found these. As I type this review, my co-worker (another husband panicking "What do I but my wife for her birthday".. he is looking at Tea's website and drooling. A great lil gem of a place. Thank you from David & Stephany Henson.

name: Chad Beasley
text: We stopped by and got a few treats and everything I tried was amazing! The heath bar cookie and cherry danish were SOOOO good! I didn’t try the gigantic cupcakes but they looked incredible! They also have ice cream and over the top milkshakes. We will be back!

name: Darryl Peterson
text: I love this place!  I do not go as often as I like because I cannot afford the weight gain it would cause.  Everyone that has helped me has been wonderful.  I think there is a "feel" here that you find when the people truly love what they do.  The selection may be smaller than other bakeries, but that is what I expect for a small, hometown bakery - quality over quantity.  Even then, I'm sure that if I requested anything in advance I could get it.

name: Art 2 Leo
text: Customer service💯...Oreo cake👌🏾...Peanut butter cake/cupcakes 🏁...and MUCH MORE. I was impressed upon arrival, witnessing one of the owners assist a customer to the car, with a beautifully decorated cake. GREAT PLACE.I’d give them 6 stars..

name: Joey Williams
text: Tried to order a Birthday cake for my daughter, was flat out told they could not get to it even with several days advance notice.  I have been faithful to this company since the first day they opened, but would not buy another thing from them, nor recommend them to anyone.

resp.text: Hello Joey thank you for your review. You just called about 30 minutes ago, if I'm not mistaken,  and asked the owner for a cake tomorrow(not advanced notice). We were more than happy to get you a traditional cake,  but you were wanting a custom designed cake.  I am completely booked on any custom cakes.  I try my absolute hardest to squeeze in as many last minute orders as I possibly can,  but I have a limit and there are people who order weeks and months in advance and I must honor their orders first.  I do apologize that we were not able to accommodate your request.

name: Greg Mattes
text: Order a custom cake, yellow cake with fudge filling and chocolate buttercream for my wife’s b-day. She said it is one of the best cakes she has had. Cake was moist, fudge filling was awesome and the chocolate buttercream was not to sweet but had lots of flavor. Lots of other desserts and pastries to try here. She is waiting for the next occasion so we can order another cake. They were very good at getting this cake for me as it was on short notice a little over a day. Thank you!

name: Scott Wheeler
text: Great place with great food and great people. They stayed open almost an hour late just so my girlfriend and I could meet up from different parts of the state and eat there. Cheap and delicious, will definitely return

resp.text: Thank you very much for stopping by.  So glad you enjoyed your experience and sweets with us.  See  you soon.

name: Lexx Slays
text: This place is absolutely amazing!!!!! Clean,  friendly,  welcoming atmosphere.  The pastries and sweets are to die for!!!! Not only are the cakes and pastries beautifully decorated they also taste amazing.  The absolute BEST place in town!!! If you haven't been GO!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for reviewing Teescakes&pastries. So glad that you enjoyed your experience with us.  Looking forward to seeing you again

name: Marsha Carr
text: Customer Service as well as the desserts was amazing.

name: Karen Leonard
text: Anointed

name: gavin ragland
text: The owner has years of experience decorating, and she is a really good person.

name: Kala Patterson
text: Very rude & poor customer service !!!

resp.text: Hello Kayy. I'm sorry you feel you had a bad experience. You left a bad review because we were not able to produce a custom cake with an extremely short notice.  You called first did not have a guest count, cake design, nor a photo of what you wanted and expected a price.  You then sent a photo late Thursday evening via Facebook after  closing hours and needed the cake produced on saturday.  I simply told you no that I was booked. Please learn proper etiquette when inquiring services. We were not being rude , we were trying to get further information from you.  Be blessed.

name: Carla Hogan
text: Holy milkshake , Batman!!! Fantastic

name: Jack Ferrell
text: THIS PLACE WAS GROSS ! THE CUPCAKES ARE JUST FAT AND NOTHING BUT ICING THAT TASTES GROSS! The food gave my whole family a stomach ache ! Never eat dinner there!

resp.text: Thanks for your response.  We stand by our products 100% if there was an issue,we would have gladly refunded you for any goods you were not satisfied with or replaced them with something that you would have enjoyed.  We only sale baked goods and pastries at this time, not dinner items.

name: betty seltzer
text: The food is excellent!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review of our business.  Your opinion means so much to us.  We hope to see you again soon.

name: April Poe
text: Best place for desserts

name: Natan Jackel
text: Sweet

name: Kanae Malbrough
text:
We used her service for our Wedding 2020 Feb. before she had her store front in Fairhope. She was very personable and very thorough. Gave us the Sample of flavor (there was a minimal cost but really low cost) on cupcake and we had fun tasting every one of them. We just wanted simple two tear cake (flower were out by us lol) and the cake was delicious!
Her store in downtown sells cookies and cupcakes now, they are all so good!

name: Serena kay
text: On Aug 1st i contacted them for a  cake on Sept 10th.  I got a reply that they are booked till November.  I will have to take my business elsewhere.  Just an FYI to anyone that wants to do business here.

name: J Ball
text: I traveled over 1200 miles to Spanish Fort to celebrate my mother's birthday. I researched this web site, which states I can order a "regular signature cake"...NOT a custom cake...with a min of 72 hours notice. I then traveled 30 minutes to see the cakes and give 5 days notice for a simple pecan cake for my mother. I was dismissed with a "sorry it's a holiday week". I reminded them their site states 72 hours, and we had 5 days. I was quickly informed "with availability." I double checked, and nowhere does it state "with availability."  Thanks for wasting our valuable time and providing poor customer service. Do not recommend. Dr. Ball

name: Matthew Joyner
text: Brittney did an excellent job with our wedding cake. We did a cake tasting, showed her a picture of a cake that we liked from pintrest, and she blew it out of the water! The cake turned out better than the picture we showed her. She set it up beautifully and helped us with everything we needed. Perfect for any wedding!

name: Lauren Tilton
text: They went out of their way! I arrived 5 mins before closing and they kindly offered to frost some cupcakes meant for the next day. Made my mom’s bday! So appreciative! The cupcakes were delicious!

name: Ray Reynolds
text: We visited @sugarhousefairhope today and met the owner Brittney. We’ve booked our wedding cake with her but just had to try the cupcakes & cookies. I had the BEST cupcake I’ve ever had in my life. Hands down. The Peanut Butter cupcake, topped Reese’s pieces, was outstanding! The peanut butter icing was so scrumptious. My fiancée had the wedding cake cupcake and loved it. Wow! Friends, these are #musthave #cupcakes.

name: Ava Abbott
text: I had a wonderful experience! The two girls who were distributing the cookie boxes I bought were just the sweetest. The cookies tasted so good and I want to know how she made the icing taste so good!

name: Alan Evenson
text: Tastes amazing! Definitely going back!

name: Jermaine Sullivan
text: Absolutely love everything I have ever purchased! Food is amazing and Absolutely love the staff, very friendly and professional!

name: Peggy Harrison
text: Cookies and Cupcakes are INCREDIBLE!! (that is all I have tried SO FAR!)  And the Customer service is so accommodating and welcoming!  Pardon the pun but that is the icing on the cake!

name: Regina Cooks
text: Absolutely love this bakery!!! Sweet treats to match the owner and staff who truely make you feel welcomed. They go above and beyond to meet their costumers needs and create beautiful, tasty treats.

name: Anneka Scott
text: Love the food thw lemon pound cake was to die for!! Customer service was a1. Absolutely love the owner!!

name: main man
text: The best place in Alabama for pastry, cakes, cookies, ice-cream. I can not say enough good things about Galore and Moore. They do specialty cakes that are simply amazing.

name: Anneka Scott
text: OMG we had the absolute best lemon pound cake ever!! The lemon flavor was just right! Not too little and not too much!! Just right! The cake was moist and perfect!! Nedra u did your Thang on this one!! Thank you for helping make my husband's birthday one to remember!!

name: Jason Stacy
text: Amazing desserts and the best cinnamon roll I ever had

name: ERIC PICKETT
text: Great vibes in this place. the owners provide a variety of tasty treats to satisfy your sweet tooth. I would definitely recommend this family friendly bakery to the great people of Alabama.

name: Emily Hendrix
text: Wow! Amazing experience. The staff was so polite and kind. The food was beyond amazing!! We had the chocolate cupcake with snickers on top as well as a fresh cinnamon roll. We were so impressed. Will definitely go back!!

name: Anne Betbeze
text: Oh my gosh, I got two cupcakes, one for my husband and one for me.   I ate them both in the car after a "little taste"!  I bought the red velvet and the peanut butter chocolate, they were fresh and delish!  I am so excited that they opened near my workplace!!  A must try!

name: Tiger Hitt
text: Absolutely the best cup cake I have ever have eaten!!!

name: Christie White
text: I love Creations Galore and Moore. They always have excellent service and one of the few places I can get gluten free goodies for my son. We ordered his Ryan's World birthday cake and it was great!!!

name: Taylor Neal
text:
As a resident of Calera, finding a locally owned bakery with such quality is incredible. The first time I visited, I was just wowed by the quality and the flavor of what I had. You don't see quality like this in such a small towns like Calera, but it's part of what makes Calera special.

The owner is so pleasant, thoughtful, and awesome to work with on any project. Go see her!

name: SOUTH CALERA TOWING TERRY SIMS
text: Always good red velvet cupcakes

name: Eliana Fulbright
text: An adorable location with amazing cakes, cupcakes, cinnamon rolls and more. Their cake decorations look like something off of those TV shows and of course the fresh Bluebell Icecream is always great.

name: Mike Ford
text: My experience was absolutely amazing , the Team at this location was very helpful and very kind , Galore & Moore is a SWEET SPOT FOR THE GREAT TOWN OF CALEARA !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

name: Valeria Lyles Mott
text: Awesome customer service, friendly environment and very knowledgeable.  My kids and I enjoyed our experience and will definitely be back.

name: blucasfurn
text: Best red velvet cupcake EVER! Absolutely divine;-)

name: Cedric Mason
text: If you haven't given them a try you're missing out

name: Milk Chocolate Animations
text: Absolutely incredible edible pastries

name: Noah Bittle
text: Super friendly service, great location, and the cupcakes were slappin. Give it a try!

name: Denita Young
text: Best cupcake i have ever had!

name: Amy Stewart
text: She is so sweet, easy to work with, always helpful and her cakes are heavenly!! I have never heard a negative comment about her cakes and cookies. Her decorating is amazing!! We have been using her for 8 years! We will never go anywhere else!! Love love love her!!

name: Jordan Moore
text: The staff at this place was amazing and helpful. The cake and cookies (Frozen) we’re top notch, and my daughter thoroughly enjoyed them. Excellent local business that has great service.

name: Ann Wooten
text: This is the only bakery you need to remember! Never will I go anywhere else for any of my cake needs! I love this place! Professional , warm, welcoming & above all is appreciative of your business  !! Wish I could give more than 5 stars

name: Jeslyn Raetz
text: I had a strawberry cupcake from here and it was delicious!!!! The icing tasted just right and the cake was moist and perfect!! I was very satisfied!!!

name: Kc Hugz
text: These cakes are Aaaamazing!!! Cake is perfect and icing is to die for!!! So good ! You won’t be disappointed!!!

name: William Somar
text: Out of business

name: Jammie Carter (Austin cool guy)
text: Great place I love it

name: Chase Ferguson
text: Nice cakes

name: Liliana Meza
text: She is amazing!

name: Nancy Daily
text: Amazing and delicious

name: Justin Armstead
text: I bought this at Sam’s Club in Montgomery, Al thinking they were a decent size (about a large slice of cake) and would be around $3-$4/slice. It didn’t have a price  on it and now I know why. It rang up $7.50!.. for a slice of cake?!? So, I gave it the benefit of the doubt and brought it home, eager to eat it for dessert. Red Velvet “snack” is on the label. Red velvet is my favorite cake and I’ve never had a bad one.. until now! It tasted like more of a tart, lemon flavored sweet cake than my normal fav.  Don’t waste your money! I wouldn’t buy this for a quarter of the price. I’m very disappointed. Emily’s, if you make a deal with a large box store like Sam’s Club, especially for way overpriced cake, make it good! I’m giving this a one star because of price and taste. What else is there to judge about cakes?? Trust me, do yourself a favor and avoid this brand.

resp.text:
Good evening Justin - I'm extremely sorry you didn't enjoy the cake. The cakes are all butter, gourmet & all natural ingredients which are expensive. Let me start by saying the Snack cakes are 8.5 oz and our slices are 4 oz.  This means the Snack cakes are double the size of our 1" thick slices. Also, the prices are shown above the cakes. The cost of the Red Velvet (specialty cake with creamcheese butter cream is actually $8.98 in Sam's Club not $7.48. The $7.48 cakes are non specialty flavors (Original, Lemon Blueberry, Key Lime & Chocolate). It sounds like there is a problem. We stand behind all of our product and I'd really appreciate if you would send a picture of the packaging and inside of the cake, if possible. We will ship you a replacement as we know our cakes are worthy and some of the BEST in the business. Please email us @ emilyshpc@gmail.com and we will gladly get to the bottom and rectify the issue. Enjoy your weekend  sir!

April
205.937.7392

name: Rod X
text: My cousin had a Chocolate Lover's Snack size in the refrigerator, I was like; 'Is that cake'; he said; 'yeah, do you want it', when I took that first bite, I couldn't stop eating it! That cake was so good!

resp.text: Awesomeness!! Welcome to the family!!

name: RAZIWELL ABDULRAHMAN
text: Good Morning from Texas! I had slices of these cakes as a gift for my birthday, then right before the holidays ordered the box of four little cakes. DELICIOUS CAKES!

name: Melanie Norton
text: My mom ordered some slices and boy! These taste just like my grandma's. I definitely recommend trying Emily's!

resp.text: Yesssssss!!! Welcome to the family!!

name: Salicia Swain
text: Hands down some of the best if not the best cakes I’ve ever had! Delicious!

name: bentley barrett
text: nothing to complain about. i had a cousin come into town and asked me to take him back here. the bill was reasonable.

resp.text: Awesome! ❤❤❤

name: Quinton Kimbrough
text:
Hands down the best poundcake in Birmingham that I've tried.

The Lemon Blueberry Buttermilk is a solid 10/10. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you!! ❤❤❤❤

name: Sharon
text: I've ordered pound cakes from Emily's on multiple occasions, and they're always moist and delicious.

resp.text: We appreciate your continued business! ❤❤❤❤

name: Vicki Seals
text: First heard of these cakes and tasted them at the Southern Women's Show and they are delicious!  10 out of 10! Loving your story... God's blessings, always!

resp.text: Thank you for being part of our blessing!! ❤❤❤❤❤

name: Briana Mitchell
text: Its was absolutely amazing. The caramel poundcake was so delicious and moist it was worth every penny

resp.text: Yessssss! ❤❤❤❤❤

name: Bri B
text:
I ordered via a delivery app last minute, and made a request for a certain type of cake in my "sampler" just in hopes they'd oblige. They delivered on time with no issues and included TWO samples of my request! Reasonably priced, no issues, and went out of their way to make my order wonderful without needing to.

The delivery was for my mom, who lives hundreds of miles away from me but a mile away from Emily's. So happy I discovered them online, she is over the moon and definitely going to become a loyal customer. Thank you for being so thoughtful and providing a great experience!

resp.text: Beautiful!! ❤❤❤❤❤

name: Montina Mcgraw
text: Oh my God!!!!!!!! Me and my husband was in Sam's and we came into Contact with this Beautiful Spirit. Not only was the cake absolutely mouthwatering &DELICIOUS, but the Testimony topped it. Keep letting Gods FAVOR and Anointing Flow through your Husband and you. Your family haven't seen nothing yet! Watch God!!!!!!♥️♥️♥️🥂

resp.text: Thank you for being part of our blessing!! ❤❤❤❤❤

name: Marilyn Windham
text:
Delicious pound cakes made with quality ingredients. Exceeded my
expectations!

resp.text: Wonderful news!! ❤❤❤❤❤❤

name: Kendra McGowan
text: Bought at Sam's great taste!!

resp.text: Awesome! Welcome to the family!

name: Anthony Wills
text: There's nothing like a great tasting cake with a wonderful taste and that's so moist you can't help but keep eating.

name: RICKY HARGROVE
text: I have to say that Jane is talented and dedicated to what her cakes look and taste like before they leave her kitchen and also  tastes so moist and the designs are so perfect to make your party a great one !!!!!!!!

name: Ariel Tanski
text: Beautiful and delicious cake. Highly recommend the lemon cake. We had a cyberpunk/sci-fi theme, but despite how weird it was, Jane really came through. Would recommend to anyone.

name: Amanda Williams
text: Jane made the most beautiful wedding cake for my niece. Will definitely be calling on her again. Thank you for the beautiful cake and delicious cakes. Can't forget the groom's cake.

name: Bethany West
text: Jane is amazing.I showed her a picture of the wedding cake I wanted and it was more than I ever  expected . the colors were perfect and the cake was delicious. I would definitely recommend her for any occasion cakes. I will be using her for all my birthday and special occasion cakes.

name: Amy Kelley
text: Great service

name: Kenny Gatlin
text: Great cupcakes

name: Chad Harris
text: 9 stars on a Rebel Flag cake with 3 days to make it now no cake for my Birthday. CLAIMS SHE DID NOT KNOW WHAT A REBEL FLAG LOOKED  LIKE.

name: Jay Clyce
text:
Where do I start?  This small business is a delight.  I believe this is such a fun place because all of the different types of cupcakes.  They have something for EVERY occasion.  They are so yummy and fun at the same time.

Do you need to treat a friend, family member, colleague or client?  If they like something sweet, this is the place.

Don’t wait.  Reward yourself or someone you want to provide a smile to.  Go NOW!!!

name: Grant Langbauer
text: When driving 14+ hours, one must stop for a Gigis Cupcake(s)

name: shandrita foster
text: Delicious as always!

name: Christy Holden
text: So many great options to choose from! I love the mini cupcakes because they provide just the right amount of sweetness. Conveniently located and can be packaged up safely to take home if you want to share with friends!

name: Rikesha Foster
text: Pretty good cupcakes. Are they anything to write mom about? Not necessarily. They are pretty on the outside, but as far as taste-wise, they are average cupcakes. Nothing more, nothing less. But give them a try.

name: MO Mules
text: Not the freshest, they were dry and overcooked..frosting was great. Maybe an off day for baking? Not sure but cake was tossed. Nice little shop and worker.

name: Sandra Accardi
text: The perfect sweet treat for a quick gift or just indulging your sweet tooth. The 2-size option is very helpful when my different moods require different levels of sweetness. Great variety of flavors!

name: David Carter
text: As a Pharmaceutical Representative, we are always looking to separate ourselves from our competitor. So, I am very reluctant to reveal this hidden jewel. The cakes and cupcakes are excellent! My customers always look forward to treats from Gigi's! As a rep they are very easy to work with and the customer service is second to none!

name: Bill Tiemann
text: This is a great place to pick up a gourmet cupcake. The cake is light and fluffy and the buttercream frosting is over the top. Highly recommended.

name: J Hanson
text: We have only had good experiences with Gigi's!  We have placed several large orders as gifts and Gigi's is always so helpful.  Their customer service is beyond excellent and they make it all so easy for us.  We will definitely continue ordering from Gigi's!

name: Eric S
text: I agree with those posting overrated.  I don't know why we keep buying from this place.  Loaded with tons of sugar on the top and the actual cake part is never really as good as you could make at home.  I could make 12 for the price of one.  Got 3 s'mores tonight and the cake was a bit stale and not very good.  In addition the receipt has a line to leave a tip.  Are you kidding me?  At nearly $4 per cupcake, they need to pay their staff more and not ask me for tip for someone reaching into a cabinet and putting a cupcake in a box.  It's a bit over the top.  I don't plan to buy any more cupcakes from there.

name: Racheal Day
text: I waited years to try GiGi's. I wasn't mind blown. They we're good but nothing special and I had to cut the icing in half.

name: Sweetpee Learning from ground Zero using my press
text: Everything was great treats and service...I hate the state the company is in...bc they have great cupcakes 😋

name: Ju Mc
text: Great cupcakes but will be permanently closing on 31MAR19.

name: James R. Landrum
text: Pleasant staff. The cupcakes didn't really suit my tastes, but I'm not huge on icing. The stuffed cookies are actually very good, though.

name: Manley Whittier
text: After eating Gigi's cupcakes many times and loving them, I was very disappointed this past Friday night. I went in your establishment after dinner and saw the Salted Caramel Chocolate cupcakes and had to try them as I love just about anything salted caramel. I also got a Sundae cupcake too. After getting home, my wife and I tried to eat the cupcakes and they tasted old and somewhat burnt. Do you bake your cupcakes fresh daily or do you keep them for sale until they are gone? We ended up throwing out what we didn't eat. I hope your quality is not going down but if I go there again and have a similar experience I will not return.

name: Bree Sison
text: I love this place probably a little too much.  Always delicious & super appreciate their military discount!

name: David McDonald
text: GiGi's Hoover catered my wedding. They were affordable, professional and most of all delicious!! We had bourbon maple cupcakes and champagne cupcakes along with a white cake with butter cream frosting for us to cut. The managers/owners Jason and Cheryl Vinyard were awesome to work with and I would easily recommend them for any occasion big or small.

name: Celeste Cohill
text: I ordered one of the lemon. The icing was delicious but the cake just didn't deliver at all.

name: Hope Heath Cox
text: GiGi's cupcakes catered my wedding cake, grooms cake, and mini cupcakes for my wedding and I am still in awe of the wonderful job that they did. I would encourage all brides in the Birmingham area to go for a tasting and you will not be disappointed. I had about 5 tastings with the most popular wedding cake bakers in the area and while they were all good, the cake at GiGi's out-tasted everyone! Not many people realize that they also offer full-size wedding cakes and not just cupcakes. I had a brunch wedding and went to taste the cinnamon roll cake that I had heard was fantastic (was actually recommended by my caterer, Kathy G). Wow, it was phenomenal!! The Chocolate grooms cake was just as tasty. I had a tight window that in which I needed the cake delivered and set up since I was having my ceremony and reception at the same place. They went out of there way to get it there in time and set up... it was absolutely perfect. Honestly the best tasting cakes I have ever had at a wedding and my guests agreed. They were also beautifully decorated! Bravo, GiGi's!

resp.text:
Hope,

Thank you so much for your wonderful comments.  It was our pleasure to share a part of your special day.

name: j milwood
text: Always a good experience and great variety offered. Kudos to the employees for always being friendly.

name: Toni Williams
text: My daughter wanted to try a Gigi's cupcake so bad, so what a perfect time to surprise her with one since she had been sick.  The the store itself is decorated beautifully, but the customer service did not match.  Since this was my first time in the store I had a lot of questions and the young lady that was assisting me really acted like, 'would you just buy a cupcake please."  I did not know what to buy so I bought 5 different kinds.  And they are wayyyyyyy to sweet, they are loaded with frosting but I thought they would have cut back on the sugar, but that was not the case. The cake stuck to the cupcake wrapper and , the boxes they put them in are beautiful but don't close all the way so the air made them hard 3 hours after I bought them.  I was really disappointed.  Not to mention the 5 I bought were almost 16.$ I would have saved money and enjoyed cupcakes from Publix better.

name: Ally D.
text: The cupcakes were really tasty. I always thought it was a little bit pricy but it was worth it. I really hope I didn't eat the one with the fly landed on..

name: Crystal Brophy
text:
SO OVERRATED!
Not a really good cupcake honestly.
Publix bakery cupcakes are 10x better!
Over rated, over priced & over iced!
I do not know why people insist on saying, "You must have a GiGi's cupcake, they are the best"! Because in my book and many people that I know agree, that they are FAR from the best.
The cake part is moist, but not that flavorful and they overdo the frosting bigtime. I could frost 3 cupcakes with the amount they put on 1 cupcake.
Not good at all.
Sorry GiGi's, you are not a top notch bakery.
SOURCE: Bought a strawberry cupcake from GiGi's a few years back and wasn't thrilled at all, specially for the price. Since then, I have had about 4 more (ones that people have had at parties and such) and I just ate a chocolate one like 10 minutes ago, every single one was the same, not good.

name: Hannah maddox
text: I loved going to GiGis kiosk in the mall because I loved the little blonde girl who worked there! So sweet and always have great conversation! I was so sad to hear that she was fired for "customer  dissatisfaction." Very very confused GiGis!!! :(

name: Connie Settles
text: We ordered the turtle cheesecake....overloaded on sugar and not very tasty. We did not enjoy these!

name: Micahel Shavers
text: Good cupcakes, prices are a bit high, but of good quality and taste.

name: Amanda Miniard
text: Came for my free birthday cupcake and they put a candle in it for me!  What a great way to make someone feel special!

name: Rosanna Dale
text: Great customer service and good Cupcakes!

name: Valerie H
text: Better than one in Trussville.  Still too expensive.

name: Janet McDonald
text: Employee was rude when I asked about coupon I had from clipper magazine. You would have thought that I had asked for a free item! I won’t be doing business here until staff has a bit of training in customer service!

resp.text: Hi Janet, all I can say is WOW!! I am so sorry this happened to you.  We have those coupons published for our guests to use.  This is totally unacceptable behavior and it won't be tolerated.  Please give us a call so we can get some information from you about your experience.  205-444-4170. Please ask for Cheryl.

name: Sheila Brown
text: Cupcakes are delicious!

name: Ashleigh
text: Great!

name: Brenna Marshall
text: Best gluten-free cupcakes ever!

name: Angela Yancy
text: Laura went out of her way to make sure our cake matched our invitations, plus there was a sugar free option, too!! This makes the third time that Blissfully Sweet has exceeded my expectations. I cannot wait until my next cake order!

name: Kim Eller
text: I have used this business twice and both times the employees have gone above and beyond. I had them make my daughters black cake with a skull and she was so excited over it we had to force her to cut it. My sons 21st birthday is coming up in a week and I'm looking forward to  seeing the work these ladies do on it.  Thank you! Excellent job! Need something stop and just see what they can do!

name: Jack Morris
text: Blissfully Sweet ' s baked goods are amazing and their customer service is incredible.  I would highly recommend this bakery to anyone!!!

name: Kristin Watson
text: This is now Cothrans bakery and it's awesome!  Donuts, cakes, cookies, cupcakes truffles!

name: Patricia Fethke
text: Best cupcakes I've ever had!

name: Tricia Colley
text: The Flour Sack made our wedding cakes this weekend and they were divine!!! The bride's cake was strawberry, and the groom's was chocolate with chocolate covered strawberries on it.... they were both so, so delicious! Thank you so much to the Flour Sack for helping make our day a little sweeter!

name: Kendra Pope
text: When my niece passed away a wonderful family purchased some cupcakes, cookies and mini pound cakes. Everything was delicious!

name: ja son
text: My daughters Fox birthday cake was so adorable !! It was also delicious and moist. Would order from them again, and again. Thank you so much The flour sack bakery

name: Juan Cepero
text: Ive been twice now and I’ve had the cupcakes, cookie sandwiches, edible cookie dough and cheesecake. It is all so delicious, probably not good for me but I don’t care because it makes me happy lol The lady at the desk is always nice and friendly. I definitely would not hesitate in getting some sweet treats from them. This place is a must visit for sure, and I can’t wait to go back for some more. A++

name: madison kimbro
text: I just ordered a birthday cake for my boyfriend’s birthday and I can honestly say that it was the best cake I have had in a while. It looked great and tasted amazing. Highly recommend this place!!!

name: Bill Crawford
text:
My wife heard about The Flour Sack from her PT(knee surgery last week). Me trying to be a good husband, she told me that she would like to try so I immediately told her let's do it. We called to make our order and were both very happy with the customer service and ease of the process and selection on short notice. We were on the circle across town so we made it there in just a few minutes. I went inside and was greeted in the most cozy, comfy place I had ever been in Dothan by a very sweet, kind lady(wish I had gotten her name so I could thank her on here but too late now, thank you for you're awesome service). Our order was already prepared that quickly but the case had items my wife didn't mention so risking getting in trouble (lol not really but husband's will understand) I asked if I could add a few items and without hesitation she was ready to help me. She packaged it up, gave me a total, I paid, and left it was a wonderful all around experience. This was the simplest part of this review lol. Skip forward a few hours, we are home and have had dinner and my wife is ready to try out the cupcakes. We both had a red velvet cupcake first and we had to stop what we were doing and thinking about to take in the experience that was happening. I can not explain in words how perfect they were, texture, smell and the taste... OMG, hands down the best red velvet anything that I've ever had my entire life (I'm 33), we then had to try another one so we each tried a different one so we could taste more without eating too much and still try more because we are still both in shock of the amazing thing happening. I got a key lime cupcake and she got a birthday cake cupcake, again we both were blown away by how incredible this all was. She is actually rushing me now because I had to stop then and write this review to let anyone know, who has a sweet tooth or any reason to get a treat, this is the place to go. We will go back in future and tell everyone we know to go try it because it is that great of an all around experience start to finish. Thank you so much and we look forward to the next time.

Update to the review, this is the next day and my wife has started negotiating terms of the last cupcake because they are that amazing.

name: Nicole Mitchell
text: Had the cupcakes.  melt in your mouth.

name: Faith McMillan
text: Doesn't answer phone calls. Their number has a busy signal the past 4 days. I just moved to the area and can't find a bakery (locally) to make my child's birthday cake. This business really needs to post a valid phone number or plug their phone in. Thumbs down.

name: An G
text: They have one of the better tasting strawberry cupcakes I've ever had. Icing had strawberry juice that made it taste better and the cupcake had fruit bits in them. We also tried the wedding cake cupcake (basic white cake that was very moist, vanilla icing was good), the carrot cupcake (quite good) and the vanilla cupcake with chocolate icing (chocolate was delicious). Overall, the cupcakes were all moist, very tasty but had slightly too much icing vs cupcake. The takeaway box had VERY little to be desired. No self respecting cupcake shop should have a box that doesn't have cupcake holders in them. All the cakes stuck together. 5 stars if it weren't for the box.

name: Tim Lynch
text: Was driving by and my 5 year old convinced me he and his sister deserved a cupcake after seeing the sign "Best Cupcakes". So happy we stopped in. Delicious. Quality pastries.  I'm a brownie guy, and the butterscotch brownie was top quality.  You can tell it scratch made!

name: Chris Bartz
text: 100% recommend! I ordered cupcakes for a bridal shower: strawberry with cream cheese icing and traditional wedding cake. Both were delicious! Not only did they taste great, they looked amazing. The cake was moist and flavorful and the icing was yummmmmmy. Everyone loved them. The staff is so nice and accommodating. Do yourself a favor and give this bakery a try!

name: Melissa Bowles
text: The cupcakes are AMAZING. I think I’ve tried every flavor and loved them all!. The cookies are also yummy, especially the chocolate chip. The owner and staff are wonderful and very accommodating. If you haven’t tried this bakery yet you’re definitely missing out!

name: Shelia Kennedy
text: first if all, when i called the bakery, the lady who answered was rude. But i still wanted delicious bakery cupcakes, so i placed my order anyway. I called ahead of time to order BIRTHDAY cupcakes. I was told I would have 6 birthday cupcakes (as I ordered). This was the day before Halloween, which was why i called to make sure I could get birthday cupcakes. When i arrived, i was given a box of 6 HALLOWEEN cupcakes. I dtated that i wanted birthday sprinkles and was then told "well, its halloween tomorrow so were only making Halloween cupcakes". I was disappointed because i had ordered ahead and was told it would be no problem. Then i was asked if i wanted to leave a tip. Which i did, reluctently (but thats on me). So paid over $20 for cupcakes, plus a $3 tip. It was not what i ordered and honestly, the yellow cupcakes were good but the chocolate ones were not, they were dry and seemed to be old. I had been there before and received great service and delicious cupcakes but this time, was very disappointed. Overpriced, rude service, and did not get what i ordered at all.

name: leigh taylor
text: The cupcakes are delicious!

name: Rhonda Clark-Ross
text:
Thank you so much for making our gender reveal special... Your cupcakes were delicious and I appreciate you taking care of my special order on such short notice. Awesome staff, friendly and personable. Highly recommend.

Rhonda R.

name: Lene Legrone
text:
If you haven’t tried this bake shop, you are missing out. She made the most amazing Game Of Thrones cake & It looked just like the picture. Renee and her staff are very talented can’t thank you enough! One more thing
Usually when a cake looks so amazing, The cake is dry. NOT this one. It was so moist and delicious.
I don’t know how they do it.
But the next time you want a phenomenal cake that will blow your guest away, try this bake shop. You will not be disappointed!

name: ry godwin
text: It was amazing!!!! Would recommend for anyone looking for a delicious treat!!!

name: Lorraine Muscarella
text: I had a birthday cake from there and it was terrible.  The cake was soggy where the filling was.  The cake itself didn’t taste right, like it had been frozen and thawed out.  It was decorated more like a wedding cake than a birthday cake. The icing was disgusting and the cake made 3 people sick.  Would not recommend or go back to this shop.

name: Debra Morrow
text: The ownership has changed as of September 2017.  The bakery products are no longer excellent. They are not even good -- They are tolerable if one is desperate for something sweet.  I bought five items expecting the same deliciousness from the previous owner.  The products were dry and lacked quality ingredients.  Because I was expecting the same quality products, I did not look closely at what I was buying.  Had I looked closer, I would have seen that they were different.  They did not look good either.  From the previous owner, I had bought many cookies, bars, cakes, slices of cake, and cupcakes for family, friends, students, co-workers, and myself.  Every time and everything was above board.  I shall not ever visit this shop again, unless the previous owner returns.

name: Timothy Jenkins
text: My wife and I had the opportunity to try the gluten free cupcakes from Something Sweet Bake Shop.  While my wife's diet is restricted, mine is not.  These cupcakes were so delicious that I could not tell that they were gluten free.  If you are in need of gluten free cakes or cupcakes, give Renee a chance to amaze you with her recipe.

name: Josh Null (Gulf Coast Finc. Advisors)
text: Some of the best desserts I've ever had. Great friendly service! Highly recommend!

name: Gail Okelley
text:
I thought I would try these cupcakes since the sign said they are the best cupcakes in Alabama. I must say I was very disappointed after paying over $8 for 3 cupcakes. There was nothing special about them and very over priced. My son took one bite and threw the rest away. What a waste of $8.

Very disappointed

name: Matt Gallagher
text: Im visiting from Boston and bought a carrot cake cup cake it was the best cupcake I've ever had in my life. A great experience inside the shop too. 5 stars all around

name: Eva Klemann
text: My customers loved  the cakes I purchased for them at Christmas. Everyone including myself are huge fans. There is nothing in this area that compares. Try the Red Velvet!

name: Nunya
text: Vanilla cupcakes here are the greatest. The icing she uses is awesome!! It's not to sweet but Heaven with a hint of almond!!! Great Oreo cake and Lemon Bars!! I just moved to Daphne and saw this place from the restaurant across the street and decided to try her cupcakes and they are Heaven!!

name: Christine Allen
text: Everything is amazing.  The red velvet cupcakes are to die for.  I've had several specialty cakes made and can't get over how delicious they were.

name: Jane Wasden
text: Wonderful pasties & excellent customer service!

name: Kailey Gibbs
text: The yummiest cupcakes ever!

name: Family Thingz
text: The best cupcakes in my whole LIFE of eating cupcakes...the Red velvet is my favorite!

name: Dawne Tynch
text: This is  a great quaint little Bakery. It's run by a young lady and her mom and they have the best homemade lemon bars that I've ever had😃 the chocolate chip cookies are wonderful!

name: Bill Eklund
text: This bakery is worth every calorie! I just ate a snickerdoodle and it totally melted in my mouth.l have 2 cupcakes that I purchased to share with my husband and it is taking all my will power to not eat them too!

name: Alan Hudson
text:
Wow!  The Lemon Bars Are Epic !!!

These ladies are crafting the finest desserts I have ever tasted.

Thank you for the joy you bring to my house.

Alan Hudson

name: Janet Walton
text: Wonderful experience everytime we visit this shop! Everything they make is pure bliss!!

name: Susan Brown
text: Amazing customer service bought a large order for a group they provided this with professional courtesy with a smile friendly for sure I was pleased all the way around the food was A-1 thank you Sweet something bake shop!!!

name: Paul Harriman
text: Go there once a week to get treats for those I visit.  Always good and always appreciated

name: Lindanne Lewis
text: The best cakes anywhere!! ...oh! And their lemon bars are awesome! !!!

name: Jackie Rodgers
text: Everything is scrumptious!

name: Kevin Garrett (kevgr5)
text: It's good, also expensive

name: Nikki Cook
text: Amazing

name: Nikki Avritt
text: Delicious

name: Crystal
text: Great Cupcakes!

name: Hornaday quickfire
text: Wife is a big fan. Hours are not friendly to our schedule.
